data.title: Celebrating 4/20, Marijuana’s Big Day
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: SEATTLE (AP) — Thursday marks marijuana culture’s high holiday, 4/20, when college students gather — at 4:20 p.m. — in clouds of smoke on campus quads and when pot shops in legal weed states thank their customers with discounts.  [LEARN MORE: Happy 4/20 Day]  This year’s edition provides an occasion for pot activists to reflect […]
